item.description:
WGBH is public service media for New England -- on TV, radio, the Web, and out in the community. WGBH’s TV Pledge Production Department is one of the most visible and recognized fundraising groups within WGBH. Highlighting the scope and mission of the WGBH Educational Foundation, and engaging viewers to support that cause, the TV Pledge Production department raises money towards WGBH's annual operating budget helping to keep the programs viewers trust and enjoy (e.g. Downton Abbey, NOVA, Curious George, Greater Boston) on the air!

Pledge Operators answer phones and record pledges of support from donors as part of WGBH’s fundraising drives. Qualifications include excellent customer services skills and friendly disposition; strong command of the English language; ability to speak loudly and clearly over the telephone; capacity to hear callers over the phone with ease; and experience using a laptop computer with basic data entry skills. A pledge shift includes dinner and training.

Volunteers should email jaime_reese@wgbh.org to volunteer for this event and be sure to include their full name. Jaime will confirm your participation via email and will send you an email reminder before your shift with information about where to park, dinner, training, etc..

 

The Boston Volunteers

Big enough to deliver, small enough to care

Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org


Learn more about your fellow Boston Volunteers:

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Volunteer During One of WGBH's TV Pledge Nights - 6/5/13
